mailer_setup_required: Email settings are required to send.

admin_top.wiki_administrator: Only wiki administrator can access this page
admin_top.assign_administrator: You can assign the selected user to be a wiki administrator on the User Management page using the 'Give admin access' button
admin_top.env_var_priority: For environment variables other than security, the value of the database is obtained preferentially.
admin_top.about_security: Check Security Settings for security environment variables.
admin_top.submit_bug_report: then submit your issue to GitHub.

v5_page_migration.page_tree_not_avaliable: Page tree feature is not available yet.
v5_page_migration.go_to_settings: Go to settings to enable the feature
v5_page_migration.migration_desc: There are some pages with old v4 compatibility. To take advantage of new features such as page trees and easy renaming, please convert all your pages to v5 compatibility.
v5_page_migration.migration_note: Note: You will lose unique constraints from the page paths.
v5_page_migration.modal_migration_warning: This process may take long. It is highly recommended that administrators tell users not to create, modify, or delete pages during the conversion.
v5_page_migration.already_upgraded: You have already completed the conversion to v5 compatibility
v5_page_migration.migration_succeeded: Your upgrade has been successfully completed! Exit maintenance mode and GROWI can be used.
v5_page_migration.migration_failed: Upgrade failed. Please refer to the GROWI docs for information on what to do in the event of failure.

maintenance_mode.warning_message_to_start: You will NOT able to access other than admin settings page. General users will NOT able to access to any contents until maintenance mode ends manually.
maintenance_mode.warning_message_to_end: Please make sure that "data importing" or "upgrading to v5" is already done or not. If not, it is highly recommended to keep maintenance mode on.
maintenance_mode.supplymentary_message_to_start: As for the API, only the administrator API will be functional.
maintenance_mode.description: Maintenance mode restricts all user operations. Always start the maintenance mode before "importing data" and "upgrading to V5". To exit, go to "Security Settings" > "Maintenance Mode".

app_setting.sitename_change: You can change site name which is used for header and HTML title.
app_setting.header_content: The contents entered here will be shown in the header etc.
app_setting.site_url_desc: This is for the site URL setting.
app_setting.site_url_warn: Some features don't work because the site URL is not set.
app_setting.siteurl_help: Site full URL beginning from http:// or https://.
app_setting.enable_files_except_image: Enabling this option will allow upload of any file type. Without this option, only image file upload is supported.
app_setting.attach_enable: You can attach files other than image files if you enable this option.
app_setting.mailer_is_not_set_up: E-mail setting is not set up.
app_setting.confirm_to_initialize_mail_settings: You can't restore to the current settings. Are you sure you want to initialize e-mail settings?
app_setting.file_delivery_method_redirect_info: Redirect: It redirects to a signed URL without GROWI server, it gives excellent performance.
app_setting.file_delivery_method_relay_info: Internal System Relay: The GROWI server delivers to clients, it provides complete security.
app_setting.fixed_by_env_var: This is fixed by the env var FILE_UPLOAD={{fileUploadType}}.
app_setting.file_upload: This is for uploading file settings. If you complete file upload settings, file upload function, profile picture function etc will be enabled.
app_setting.change_setting: Caution:if you change this setting not completed, you will not be able to access files you have uploaded so far.
app_setting.custom_endpoint_change: Input the URL of the endpoint of an object storage service like MinIO that has a S3-compatible API.  Amazon S3 is used if empty.
app_setting.use_env_var_if_empty: If the value in the database is empty, the value of the environment variable {{variable}} is used.
app_setting.note_for_the_only_env_option:
The GCS Settings is limited by the value of environment variable.
To change this setting, please change to false or delete the value of the environment variable {{env}} .

markdown_setting.lineBreak_desc: You can change line break settings.

lineBreak_options.enable_lineBreak_desc: Convert line break in the text page to<br>in HTML
lineBreak_options.enable_lineBreak_for_comment_desc: Convert line break in comment to<br>in HTML

indent_options.indentSize_desc: Set the default indent size for the Markdown editor
indent_options.disallow_indent_change: Disallow change of indent size by users
indent_options.disallow_indent_change_desc: Force users to use ther default indent size.

markdown_setting.xss_desc: You can change the handling of HTML tags in markdown text.

xss_options.remove_all_tags_desc: Stripe all HTML tags and attributes

default_sidebar_mode.title: Default sidebar mode
default_sidebar_mode.desc: You can set the sidebar mode for new users and guests visiting the page.
default_sidebar_mode.dock_mode_default_desc: You can set the initial state of the sidebar when Dock Mode is selected.
default_sidebar_mode.dock_mode_default_open: Open the page as it was opened from the beginning
default_sidebar_mode.dock_mode_default_close: Open the page as it was closed from the beginning

customize_setting.function_desc: You can choose Valid/Invalid of the function

function_options.timeline_desc1: You can show the timeline of the child pages.
function_options.timeline_desc2: If there are many child pages, performance decreases while page loading.
function_options.timeline_desc3: You can speed up list page display by invalidating.
function_options.tab_switch_desc1: Save edit tab and history tab switching in the browser and make it object for forward/back command of the browser.
function_options.tab_switch_desc2: By invalidating, you can make page transition as the only object for forward/back command of the browser.
function_options.attach_title_header: Add h1 section when create new page automatically
function_options.attach_title_header_desc: Add page path to the first line as h1 section when create new page.
function_options.list_num_s: Number of list displayed on modals
function_options.list_num_desc_s: Set number of list per page such as 'Page List', 'Timeline', 'Page History' and 'Attachment' pages.
function_options.list_num_m: Number of list displayed on article pages included other contents
function_options.list_num_desc_m: Set number of list per page such as 'Bookmarks' and 'Recently created' pages.
function_options.list_num_l: Number of list displayed on 'Search' pages
function_options.list_num_desc_l: Set number of list per page such as 'Search' pages.
function_options.list_num_xl: Number of list displayed on article pages
function_options.list_num_desc_xl: Set number of list per page such as 'Not found' and 'Trash' pages.
function_options.stale_notification_desc: Displays the notification to pages more than 1 year since the last update.
function_options.show_all_reply_comments_desc: When the setting value is off, comments other than the latest two are omitted.
function_options.select_search_scope_children_as_default: Select 'Only children of this tree' as default value of search range
function_options.select_search_scope_children_as_default_: When the setting value is off, 'All pages' is used as default value of search range.

customize_setting.nocdn_desc:
This function is disabled when the environment variable NO_CDN=true.
Github style has been forcibly applied.
customize_setting.custom_title_detail: You can customize <title> tag. Following placeholders will be automatically replaced:
customize_setting.custom_title_detail_placeholder1: {{sitename}} - The site name of this wiki.
customize_setting.custom_title_detail_placeholder2: {{pagename}} - The page name of the current page.
customize_setting.custom_title_detail_placeholder3: {{pagepath}} - The page path of the current page.
customize_setting.custom_header_detail:
You can customize HTML header that applies all pages. Your custom script will be inserted in <header> but above other <script> tags.
Relaod page to see changes.
customize_setting.write_css: You can write CSS that is applied to whole system.
customize_setting.write_java: You can write Javascript that is applied to whole system.
customize_setting.reflect_change: You need to reload the page to reflect the change.

error.only_upsert_available: Only 'Upsert' option is available for pages collection.

description_of_import_mode.about: When you import data with the same name as an existing one, choose from the following three modes below.
description_of_import_mode.upsert: Upsert: Overwrite and update the existing data with imported data.
description_of_import_mode.flash_and_insert: Flash and Insert: After deleting the existing data completely, import the data

errors.different_versions: This growi and the uploaded data versions are not met
errors.depends: '{{target}}' must be selected when '{{condition}}' is selected.

overwrite_author.label: Overwrite page's author with the current user
overwrite_author.desc: Recommended NOT to check this when users will also be restored.

set_public_to_page.label: Set 'Public' to the pages that is '{{from}}'
set_public_to_page.desc: Make sure that this configuration makes all '{{from}}' pages readable from ANY users.

initialize_meta_datas.label: Initialize page's like, read users and comment count
initialize_meta_datas.desc: Recommended NOT to check this when users will also be restored.

initialize_hackmd_related_datas.label: Initialize HackMD related data
initialize_hackmd_related_datas.desc: Recommended to check this unless there is important drafts on HackMD.

overwrite_author.label: Overwrite revision's author with the current user
overwrite_author.desc: Recommended NOT to check this when users will also be restored.

importer_management.skip_username_and_email_when_overlapped: Skip username and email using same username and email in new environment
importer_management.page_skip: Pages with a name that already exists on GROWI are not imported

export_management.desc_password_seed:
DO NOT FORGET to set current PASSWORD_SEED to your new GROWI system when restoring user data, or users will NOT be able to login with their password.

HINT:
The current PASSWORD_SEED will be stored in meta.json in exported ZIP.

external_notification.caution_enabled: CAUTION: Currently, notifications that are configured in this page will send only to the Slack Workspace set as primary.

slack_integration.adding_slack_ws_integration_settings_suc: Slack workspace integration settings have been added
slack_integration.bot_all_reset_successful: All Bot settings have been reset.
slack_integration.set_scope: Please set up Bot Token Scopes from Slack settings

modal.sure_change_bot_type: Are you sure you want to change the bot type?
modal.changes_will_be_deleted: Settings for other bot types will be deleted.

toastr.delete_slack_integration_procedure: Succeeded to delete the slack integration procedure

slack_integration.use_env_var_if_empty: If the value in the database is empty, the value of the environment variable {{variable}} is used.
slack_integration.slackbot_settings_notice:
The Slack workspace integration procedure will be deleted.
Are you sure?
slack_integration.all_settings_of_the_bot_will_be_reset:
All settings of the Bot will be reset.
Are you sure?

accordion.register_for_growi_official_bot_proxy_se: Register for GROWI Official Bot Proxy Service
accordion.register_for_growi_custom_bot_proxy: Register for your GROWI Custom Bot Proxy
accordion.paste_growi_url: Since a modal is displayed, enter the following URL in GROWI URL.
accordion.enter_access_token_for_growi_and_proxy: Enter Access Token Proxy to GROWI and Access Token GROWI to Proxy
accordion.copy_proxy_url: When the above step are completed successfully, the Proxy URL will be displayed in the Slack Channel you selected in the modal, so copy it.
accordion.enter_proxy_url_and_update: Enter and update the Proxy URL that you copied in the above step in the Proxy URL of the Custom bot with proxy integration on this page.
accordion.dont_need_update: ※If the value is already in there, there is no need to update it.
accordion.go-to-manage-distribution: Go to "Manage Settings" > "Manage distribution" on your Slack App page.
accordion.activate-public-distribution: In "Share Your App with Other Workspaces", make sure all items are checked and click "Activate Public Distribution"
accordion.install_complete_if_checked: Confirm that "Install your app" is checked.
accordion.invite_bot_to_channel: Invite GROWI bot to channel by calling @example.
accordion.register_secret_and_token: Set Signing Secret and Bot Token
accordion.multiple_growi_command: Commands that could be sent to multiple GROWI instances at once
accordion.single_growi_command: Commands that could be sent to single GROWI instance at a time
accordion.allowed_channels_description: Input allowed channels for "{{keyName}}" command. Separate each channel with "," . Users can will be able to use "{{keyName}}" command from channels written here.
accordion.unfurl_description: Show GROWI page contents when page links have been shared on Slack
accordion.unfurl_allowed_channels_description: Input allowed channel IDs for "unfurl" . Separate each channel with "," . GROWI public page links or permanent links sent in specified channels will show the content in the message.
accordion.allow_specified_long: Allow specified (Allowed from only specified channels)
accordion.test_connection_by_pressing_button: Press the button to test the connection
accordion.test_connection_only_public_channel: Please test connection in a public channel
accordion.error_check_logs_below: An error has occurred. Please check the logs below.
accordion.send_message_to_slack_work_space: Send message to Slack work space.

integration_sentence.integration_is_not_complete:
Integration is not complete.
Proceed with the following integration procedure.
integration_sentence.integration_some_ws_is_not_complete: Some work spaces is not linked

slack_integration_legacy.alert_Pd: This 'Legacy Slack Integration' is currently disabled because the new settings is enabled.
slack_integration_legacy.alert_deplicated: This 'Legacy Slack Integration' is outdated and will be discontinued in the future. Use the new settings instead.

user_management.click_twice_same_checkbox: You should check at least one checkbox.

invite_modal.emails: Emails (Possible to issue multiple people with new lines)
invite_modal.description1: Temporarily issue new users by email addresses.
invite_modal.description2: A temporary password will be generated for the first login.
invite_modal.temporary_password: The created user has a temporary password
invite_modal.send_new_password: Please send the new password to the user.
invite_modal.send_temporary_password: If you have not sent an invitation email, copy the temporary password on this screen and contact the inviter.
invite_modal.send_email: You can also send or resend the invitation email from the drop-down in the users table.

user_table.your_own: You cannot deactivate your own account
user_table.cannot_remove: You cannot remove yourself from administrator

reset_password_modal.password_never_seen: The temporary password can never be retrieved after this screen is closed.
reset_password_modal.password_reset_message: Let the user know the new password below and strongly recommend to change another one immediately.
reset_password_modal.send_new_password: Please send the new password to the user.

user_management.cannot_invite_maximum_users: Can not invite more than the maximum number of users.

user_group_management.deny_create_group: You can't create a new group with the current settings.

add_modal.description: The added user will also be added to all parent groups.
add_modal.add_user: Add a user to the created group

user_group_management.no_pages: There are no pages the group has view permission.

delete_modal.desc: All child groups under the group will also be deleted. Once deleted, the deleted group and its private pages cannot be retrieved.
delete_modal.dropdown_desc: Choose an action for private pages

update_parent_confirm_modal.header: The parent of the group will be changed
update_parent_confirm_modal.caution_change_parent: This operation will change the parent of the group "{{groupName}}".
update_parent_confirm_modal.danger_message: Note that this affects the permissions to view all pages associated with this group.
update_parent_confirm_modal.force_update_parents_description: Enable this option to force the addition of missing users to the ancestor groups if they exist after changing a parent group.

audit_log_management.activity_expiration_date_explain: Created Audit Log are automatically deleted after the number of seconds set in the environment variable from the creation time
audit_log_management.fixed_by_env_var: This is fixed by the env var {{key}}={{value}}.
audit_log_management.available_action_list_explain: List of actions that can be searched/viewed in the current settings
audit_log_management.disable_mode_explain: Audit log is currently disabled. To enable it, set the environment variable AUDIT_LOG_ENABLED to true.

audit_log_action.SHARE_LINK_DELETE_BY_PAGE: Remove all shared links on the page
audit_log_action.ADMIN_USER_NOTIFICATION_SETTINGS_ADD: Add User trigger notification notification settings
audit_log_action.ADMIN_USER_NOTIFICATION_SETTINGS_DELETE: Delete User trigger notification notification settings
audit_log_action.ADMIN_SLACK_PROXY_URI_UPDATE: Update Proxy URL for Custom bot with proxy
audit_log_action.ADMIN_SLACK_WITHOUT_PROXY_SETTINGS_UPDAT: Update Slack bot without proxy settings
audit_log_action.ADMIN_SLACK_WITHOUT_PROXY_PERMISSION_UPD: Update Slack bot without proxy permissions
audit_log_action.ADMIN_SLACK_WITHOUT_PROXY_TEST: Test connection to Slack bot without proxy

g2g_data_transfer.transfer_data_to_another_growi: Transfer data from this GROWI to another GROWI
g2g_data_transfer.transfer_data_to_this_growi: Transfer data from another GROWI to this GROWI
g2g_data_transfer.transfer_key_limit: Transfer keys are valid for 1 hour after issuance.
g2g_data_transfer.once_transfer_key_used: Once the transfer key is used for transfer, it cannot be used for any other transfer.
g2g_data_transfer.transfer_to_growi_cloud: If you wish to transfer to GROWI.cloud, please click here.
